title: Water Leakage Policy
text: For water leakage issues, maintenance visits are scheduled within 24 hours on working days. Tenants can escalate if not resolved within 48 hours.

title: Rent Payment and Refunds
text: If a tenant is charged twice, a refund will be initiated within 5-7 business days after verification by the accounts team.

title: Noise Complaints
text: Noise complaints between 10 PM and 6 AM are treated as high priority. Security staff will visit the location and issue a warning if needed.

title: Maintenance SLA
text: General maintenance tickets are responded to within 24 hours, with a resolution target of 72 hours for most issues.

title: Internet Issues
text: Internet issues are handled by the ISP partner. Tenants should raise a ticket in the app, and the ISP will contact them within 12 hours.

title: Housekeeping and Cleaning
text: Common areas are cleaned daily in the morning. Tenants can raise tickets for special cleaning requests.

title: Security and Safety
text: Security staff is on duty 24/7 and conducts routine checks. Tenants can contact the helpdesk or gate security in case of emergencies.

title: Parking Policy
text: Each flat is allocated one parking space. Unauthorized parking in another tenant's slot may result in penalties.

title: Ticket Escalation
text: If a ticket is not attended within the defined SLA, tenants can escalate through the app or helpline for priority handling.

title: Appreciation Handling
text: Positive feedback about staff or facilities is documented and shared with the respective teams during monthly reviews.
